entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 March 2023
